thread.title: India captain MS Dhoni achieves yet another milestone
thread.title_full: India captain MS Dhoni achieves yet another milestone

title: India captain MS Dhoni achieves yet another milestone
text:
Recent Match Played: South Africa won by 18 runs 
The 34-year-old Dhoni scored 47 and on way to that, went past Fleming in the list of most ODI runs as a captain. Only former Australian skipper Ricky Ponting is ahead of Dhoni. 
Dhoni, who started his ODI career in 2004 and became the leader of the 50-over team in 2007, has so far scored 6,313 ODI runs (184 matches) as a captain. As a skipper, he has 6 hundreds and 46 half centuries. 
Overall, the wicketkeeper-batsman has accumulated 8,790 ODI runs in 268 games at an average of 52.63 with 9 tons and 60 fifties. 
Fleming, who captained New Zealand from 1997 to 2007, finished his career with 6,295 runs in 218 ODIs as skipper. 
In the top-10 list of captains with most ODI runs, Dhoni has the best average - 56.87. The top most batsman Ponting averages 42.91 with 8,497 runs in 230 matches. 
Most ODI runs as a captain (Top 5) 
8,497 runs (230 matches) - Ricky Ponting (Australia) 
6,313 (184) - MS Dhoni (India) 
6,295 (218) - Stephen Fleming (New Zealand) 
5,608 (193) - Arjuna Ranatunga (Sri Lanka) 
5,416 (150) - Graeme Smith (South Africa) 
OneIndia News
